name: Fall of the Future (TestUsernameStudios)
description:
!!XBOX CONTROLLER REQUIRED!!

It is the year 2346, the world is overrun by mutants and bandits both fighting for dominance over the world, a small resistance movement fights to save whoever is left, and have received word of a way to wrestle some control from these factions, and decide that must act now, or whatever is left of humanity and morals may be wiped off the face of the earth forever.

!!THIS GAME IS A PROTOTYPE!!

Controls:

Movement - Left Stick

Fire Weapon - X

Exit Game - Alt + F4

Important Tips:

- If the player can no longer move or shoot, and a red circle appears around them, they must be revived. The standing player must then stand within the red circle, until the other player can move again.

- If both players are downed, the game doesn't end

Change log:

- v1.01: Added audio to bonus level (3/12/19)

- v1.02: Minor bug fixes (3/12/19)
